atkId_Bullet.Wiki: Register each attack parameter ID. Attack type / Attack material / Physical attack power / Magic attack power / Stamina attack power / Knockback distance.

sfxId_Bullet.Wiki: Plays the specified SFX on the bullet's position for its duration (-1 for no SFX).

sfxId_Hit.Wiki: Plays the specified SFX where the bullet collides with the world (one-time, -1 for no SFX).

sfxId_Flick.Wiki: Plays the specified SFX where the bullet collides with a target with flick defense (ex. an arrow hitting a shield)

life.Wiki: Duration (in seconds) that the bullet will exist (-1 for infinity).

dist.Wiki: Distance (in meters) traveled at which 'in range' values are swapped for 'out of range' values.

shootInterval.Wiki: Frequency (in seconds) additional bullets of this type will be generated from active TAE event frames (0 for no extra bullets).

gravityInRange.Wiki: Adds vertical velocity to the bullet over time (in range).

gravityOutRange.Wiki: Adds vertical velocity to the bullet over time (out of range).

hormingStopRange.Wiki: Distance (in meters) from the bullet's target where homing behavior is disabled.

initVellocity.Wiki: Initial movement speed of the bullet.

accelInRange.Wiki: Accelerates the bullet's velocity by this value (in range).

accelOutRange.Wiki: Accelerates the bullet's velocity by this value (out of range).

maxVellocity.Wiki: The maximum movement speed that the bullet may reach.

minVellocity.Wiki: The minimum movement speed that the bullet may reach.

accelTime.Wiki: Time (in seconds) that must pass before acceleration values are applied.

homingBeginDist.Wiki: Distance (in meters) the bullet must have traveled before homing behavior is enabled.

hitRadius.Wiki: Radius (in meters) of the bullet's hit sphere.

hitRadiusMax.Wiki: Radius (in meters) of the bullet's hit sphere at the end of Radius Spread Time (if -1, no change occurs).

spreadTime.Wiki: Time (in seconds) over which Hit Radius gradually changes to 'Max. Hit Radius'.

expDelay.Wiki: (Unknown) Time from landing to explosion (if 0, it explodes immediately).

hormingOffsetRange.Wiki: Distance (in meters) by which the bullet will lead a homing target in the direction of its movement (0 for exact precision).

dmgHitRecordLifeTime.Wiki: Frequency (in seconds) that the bullet is able to apply effects while moving through a target (0 to apply once per target)

externalForce.Wiki: Velocity applied externally in the initial direction of the bullet's origin. (Yaw is ignored)

spEffectIDForShooter.Wiki: Applies the specified SpEffectParam to the owner of the bullet (usually the entity firing it)

autoSearchNPCThinkID.Wiki: Applies the specified NPCThinkParam to the bullet to modify its behavior.

HitBulletID.Wiki: Creates the specified BulletParam on a condition determined by Launch Condition Type.

spEffectId0.Wiki: Applies the specified SpEffectParam to targets hit by the bullet.

spEffectId1.Wiki: Applies the specified SpEffectParam to targets hit by the bullet.

spEffectId2.Wiki: Applies the specified SpEffectParam to targets hit by the bullet.

spEffectId3.Wiki: Applies the specified SpEffectParam to targets hit by the bullet.

spEffectId4.Wiki: Applies the specified SpEffectParam to targets hit by the bullet.

numShoot.Wiki: The amount of bullet copies that will be fired (including on 'Shot Interval').

homingAngle.Wiki: Turn rate (in degrees per second) of the bullet towards the homing target.

shootAngle.Wiki: Yaw (left/right) angle offset for all bullets.

shootAngleInterval.Wiki: Yaw (left/right) angle offset between multiple projectiles (as specified in 'Shot Amount').

shootAngleXInterval.Wiki: Pitch (up/down) angle offset between multiple projectiles (as specified in 'Shot Amount').

damageDamp.Wiki: Physical damage decrease (in percents per second) when the bullet is 'out of range'.

spelDamageDamp.Wiki: Magic damage decrease (in percents per second) when the bullet is 'out of range'.

fireDamageDamp.Wiki: Fire damage decrease (in percents per second) when the bullet is 'out of range'.

thunderDamageDamp.Wiki: Lightning damage decrease (in percents per second) when the bullet is 'out of range'.

staminaDamp.Wiki: Stamina damage decrease (in percents per second) when the bullet is 'out of range'.

knockbackDamp.Wiki: Knockback decrease (in percents per second) when the bullet is 'out of range'.

shootAngleXZ.Wiki: Pitch (up/down) angle offset for all bullets.

lockShootLimitAng.Wiki: Angle (in degrees) which controls how far from the initial direction bullets can face towards targets.

prevVelocityDirRate.Wiki: Ratio to add the previous movement direction to the current direction when the sliding bullet hits the wall

atkAttribute.Wiki: The physical damage type of the bullet.

spAttribute.Wiki: The 'special' (often elemental) damage type of the bullet.

Material_AttackType.Wiki: (Unknown) Specify what the attack attribute is

Material_AttackMaterial.Wiki: (Unknown) Used for SFX / SE during attack

isPenetrateChr.Wiki: If ON, the bullet pierces through characters without expiring. Effects on penetrated characters are specified by 'Damage Hit Cooldown'.

isPenetrateObj.Wiki: If ON, the bullet pierces through dynamic / partial destruction assets without expiring.

launchConditionType.Wiki: Specify the condition to judge whether to generate a bullet when it lands or the life is extinguished

FollowType.Wiki: The type of following behavior exhibited by the bullet. (0 for default behavior).

EmittePosType.Wiki: The type of algorithm used to determine the spawning locations of bullets.

isAttackSFX.Wiki: If ON, the bullet SFX will remain lodged in targets. Used by arrows and throwing knives.

isPenetrateMap.Wiki: If ON, the bullet pierces through the map / static assets without expiring.

isHitBothTeam.Wiki: If ON, the bullet will affect the owner's allies as well.

isUseSharedHitList.Wiki: If ON, multiple bullets (from 'Shot Amount' or 'Shot Interval') will not affect the same target.

isUseMultiDmyPolyIfPlace.AltName: Use Multiple Dummy Polys for Placement
isUseMultiDmyPolyIfPlace.Wiki: (Unknown) Do you use the same Damipoly ID more than once when placing bullets?

isHitOtherBulletForceEraseA.AltName: Force Erase Bullet A if Hit by Other Bullet
isHitOtherBulletForceEraseA.Wiki: Does it hit other bullets forced erasure A?

isHitOtherBulletForceEraseB.AltName: Force Erase Bullet B if Hit by Other Bullet
isHitOtherBulletForceEraseB.Wiki: Does it hit the other bullet forced erasure B?

isHitForceMagic.Wiki: Do you hit the force magic?

isIgnoreSfxIfHitWater.AltName: Is SFX ignored on Water Hit
isIgnoreSfxIfHitWater.Wiki: (Unknown) Should I ignore the effect if it hits the surface of the water?

isIgnoreMoveStateIfHitWater.Wiki: If ON, the bullet will collide with water surfaces.

isHitDarkForceMagic.AltName: Is Bullet deflected by Bullet Deflection
isHitDarkForceMagic.Wiki: If ON, this bullet can be deflected by other bullets with 'Attach Effect Type' set to 3.

dmgCalcSide.Wiki: Damage calculation side. During multiplayer, the damage calculation is for switching between the giving side and the receiving side.

isEnableAutoHoming.Wiki: Whether to automatically follow when not locked on

isSyncBulletCulcDumypolyPos.AltName: Is Emitter Source Synced with Bullet
isSyncBulletCulcDumypolyPos.Wiki: In the case of a synchronously generated bullet, the emitter attitude at the time of synchronization is used without recalculating the attitude due to the Damipoli position when the bullet is generated.

isOwnerOverrideInitAngle.Wiki: If ON, inherits the direction from the original bullet that spawned it. Only valid for child bullets.

isInheritSfxToChild.AltName: Is SFX Inherited by Child Bullet
isInheritSfxToChild.Wiki: When creating a new bullet with 'Child Bullet ID', pass on the current bullet's SFX. Ignores SFX IDs on the child.

darkDamageDamp.Wiki: Holy damage decrease (in percents per second) when the bullet is 'out of range'.

bulletSfxDeleteType_byHit.AltName: Bullet SFX Delete Type - By Hit
bulletSfxDeleteType_byHit.Wiki: Bullet SFX extinction type when landing or playing

bulletSfxDeleteType_byLifeDead.AltName: Bullet SFX Delete Type - By Expiration
bulletSfxDeleteType_byLifeDead.Wiki: Bullet SFX extinction type at the end of life

targetYOffsetRange.Wiki: Vertical offset of landing position. Shift the target position up and down at the time of launch and during homing. (-N ~ n)

shootAngleYMaxRandom.Wiki: Upper limit of random number of firing angle (0 to 360)

shootAngleXMaxRandom.Wiki: Upper limit of firing elevation random number (0 to 360)

intervalCreateBulletId.Wiki: Bullet ID used when making bullets at regular intervals

intervalCreateTimeMin.Wiki: Minimum interval for making bullets at regular intervals (0 to n)

intervalCreateTimeMax.Wiki: Maximum interval for making bullets at regular intervals (function is disabled if 0 to n 0)

predictionShootObserveTime.Wiki: Average speed observation time of predicted shooting function (function is invalid if 0 to 40)

intervalCreateWaitTime.Wiki: Waiting time to start making bullets at regular intervals

sfxPostureType.Wiki: Set the initial attitude of an SFX or sub-bullet created from a bullet

createLimitGroupId.Wiki: If it is 0, it is unused. If the upper limit is reached when creating a bullet set in the same group Id, that bullet will not be created. (Bullets created synchronously on the network will be released regardless)

isInheritSpeedToChild.AltName: Is Speed Inherited by Child Bullet
isInheritSpeedToChild.Wiki: Take over the speed of the timing to replace the submunition. Ignore the speed set for the submunition

isDisableHitSfx_byChrAndObj.AltName: Is SFX Disabled on Chr/Object Hit
isDisableHitSfx_byChrAndObj.Wiki: When ON, the bullet parameter landing SFX does not play even if it hits a character / object.

isCheckWall_byCenterRay.AltName: Is Wall Checked by Center Ray
isCheckWall_byCenterRay.Wiki: There was a problem with the digging judgment when firing a bullet, so it is for error handling. SEQ23101 [Own character] If you use a soul short arrow or a strong soul short arrow in close contact with a character with a high lock-on position, the direction of the bullet will be reversed.

isUseBulletWallFilter.Wiki: Do you use primitive magic Atari? It will change to a filter that corresponds to the Atari dedicated to primitive magic.

isNonDependenceMagicForFunnleNum.AltName: Is Follow Bullet Count not scaled by INT
isNonDependenceMagicForFunnleNum.Wiki: The number of funnels on the PC does not fluctuate by force. Become the number of shots

isAiInterruptShootNoDamageBullet.Wiki: Does it react to AI bullets (even with 0 attack power)?

randomCreateRadius.Wiki: The range of bullets used when the source type is set to occur at random locations.

assetNo_Hit.Wiki: The number of the asset to be generated at the time of landing. -1: Do not generate. The asset number is the last 6 digits of the asset. Example: AEG999_999 = 999999

lifeRandomRange.Wiki: Add a random number of seconds with a set time fluctuation range to the lifetime [s].

homingAngleX.Wiki: Only the X-axis component of the inductive performance is changed. Do not change with -1

seId_Bullet1.Wiki: Insert SE ID1 for [Bullet]. -1: Not generated 9 digits. Sound type is fixed to s: SFX.

seId_Bullet2.Wiki: Insert SE ID 2 for [Bullet]. -1: Not generated 9 digits. Sound type is fixed to s: SFX.

seId_Hit.Wiki: Insert SE ID 1 for [landing]. -1 does not occur. 9 digits. Sound type is fixed to s: SFX.

seId_Flick.Wiki: [At the time of repelling] Enter SE ID1 for. -1 does not occur. 9 digits. Sound type is fixed to s: SFX.

howitzerShootAngleXMin.Wiki: [Curly fire] The lower limit [deg] with the firing elevation angle as a reference (0 deg) before applying the curve fire calculation.

howitzerShootAngleXMax.Wiki: [Sky firing] The upper limit [deg] based on the firing elevation angle (0deg) before applying the bending firing calculation.

howitzerInitMinVelocity.Wiki: [Song firing] The minimum speed limit for song firing calculation [m / s].

howitzerInitMaxVelocity.Wiki: [Song firing] Maximum speed limit for song firing calculation [m / s].

sfxId_ForceErase.Wiki: SFX ID at the time of forced erasure. -1 does not occur.

bulletSfxDeleteType_byForceErase.AltName: Bullet SFX Delete Type - By Force Erase
bulletSfxDeleteType_byForceErase.Wiki: Bullet SFX extinction type at the time of forced erasure

followDmypoly_forSfxPose.AltName: Follow Bullet - Dummy Poly for SFX Pose
followDmypoly_forSfxPose.Wiki: SFX direction specification when following Damipoli

spBulletDistUpRate.Wiki: Special effect flight distance correction magnification

nolockTargetDist.Wiki: Target range when unlocked (-1: Refer to range, 0: No target)
